name: FATAL ERROR (Tekkou Studios)
description:
If you had the power to program a person, would you?

FATAL ERROR explores the story of James and Sammy, high school lovers. Their physical relationship may have been cut short, but that won't stop James from loving Sammy. Nothing will.

GAME CREDIT:

Adam Keith

SPECIAL THANKS:

Riley Keith

NOTE:

This game contains disturbing content not intended for young audiences. Player discretion is advised.
